title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Introduction, Scope and classification of welding Description of welding processes (including advanced welding techniques), operating characteristics Physics of welding; Heat and mass transfer Metallurgical principles of welding Metallurgical effects of the weld thermal cycles. Weldability; effect of process parameters Welding of steels including low carbon and low alloy steels, austenitic steels, special steels Residual welding stresses and stress relieving treatments Mathematical modeling in welding Welding defects and their remedies.
